LanguageData.OE_Battery_Medium.label: obsidia battery
LanguageData.OE_Battery_Medium.description: Stores large amounts of electricity for later use. Due to Obsidia technologies, this battery unit is significantly more efficient. Charged large advanced batteries are waterproof and don't explode when exposed to rain.
LanguageData.OE_Battery_Large.label: large obsidia battery
LanguageData.OE_Battery_Large.description: Stores huge amounts of electricity for later use. Due to Obsidia technologies, this battery unit is significantly more efficient. Charged large advanced batteries are waterproof and don't explode when exposed to rain.
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusGenerator_Medium.label: syntherius powered generator
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusGenerator_Medium.descriptio: Produces power by consuming syntherius. Must be periodically loaded with syntherius fuel by hand.
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusGenerator_Large.label: large syntherius powered generator
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusGenerator_Large.description: Produces a large amount of power by consuming syntherius. Must be periodically loaded with syntherius fuel by hand.
LanguageData.OE_QuantumGenerator_Micro.label: portable quantum generator
LanguageData.OE_QuantumGenerator_Micro.description: Generates small amounts of free energy, forever, without using fuel. Due to Obsidia technologies, this generator is extremely fragile.
LanguageData.OE_QuantumGenerator_Medium.label: quantum generator
LanguageData.OE_QuantumGenerator_Medium.description: Generates free energy, forever, without using fuel. Due to Obsidia technologies, this generator is extremely fragile.
LanguageData.OE_QuantumGenerator_Large.label: large quantum generator
LanguageData.OE_QuantumGenerator_Large.description: Generates large amounts of free energy, forever, without using fuel. Due to Obsidia technologies, this generator is extremely fragile.
LanguageData.OE_GeothermalGenerator.label: obsidia geothermal generator
LanguageData.OE_GeothermalGenerator.description: This small, Obsidia generator produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a steam geyser.
